DOC.brief_summary: To investigate the changes of gastrointestinal microbiota in irritable bowel syndrome patients by hydrogen breath test and molecular-based analysis of microbiota in gastrointestinal tract
DOC.brief_title: Changes of Microbiota in Irritable Bowel Syndrome Patients
DOC.criteria: Case group: 20 to 80 years old irritable bowel syndrome patients Control group: 20 to 80 years old healthy subjects without writtent informed consent contraindications for enteroscopy
